country.country_description: Anestar is a small planet located in the outer reaches of the galaxy. It is a peaceful place, where the inhabitants live in harmony with nature and each other. The people of Anestar are friendly and welcoming to visitors.
country.people_description: The people of Anestar are an ancient race, with a long and proud history. They are spiritual people, and believe in the power of the cosmos and the natural world. They are also highly intelligent and technologically advanced.
country.language_description: Anestari is the native language of the people of Anestar. It is a complex language, with a unique grammar and a large vocabulary. It is spoken by the people of Anestar, and is rarely heard elsewhere.
